Comments.Security_TicketSigningKey: For production: Set environment variable SECURITY__TICKETSIGNINGKEY or use User Secrets (dotnet user-secrets set Security:TicketSigningKey 'your-key-here'). Min 32 chars required. Generate with: openssl rand -base64 48
Comments.Security_EncryptionKey: For production: Set environment variable SECURITY__ENCRYPTIONKEY or use User Secrets (dotnet user-secrets set Security:EncryptionKey 'your-key-here'). Min 32 chars required. Generate with: openssl rand -base64 32. Used to encrypt sensitive PII (driver's license numbers, license plates)
